{"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>6. Bey Herrn Haag an der Augustinergaß sind zu verkauffen: <BIBL><TITLE>Prideaun A. und N. Testam</TITLE>, in einer Connex. mit der Völcker-Historie, <PLACE>Berlin</PLACE> <YEAR>1725</YEAR>. <VOLUME>4. 1I. Tom. 1. Vol. 2</VOLUME> fl <PRIZE>Cattenburg</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Sapientia Mos. de Vita & Scriptis Mosis contra Deistas</TITLE>. <PLACE>Amst.</PLACE> <YEAR>1737</YEAR>. <FORMAT>4.</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Bibl.</TITLE> <VOLUME>8r. 70.</VOLUME> <AUTHOR>Interpp. Reineccii</AUTHOR>, <PLACE>Lips.</PLACE> <YEAR>1737</YEAR>. <FORMAT>8.</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Bibl. Hebr.</TITLE> von <AUTHOR>punctata Leusdenii</AUTHOR>, <PLACE>Frf.</PLACE> <YEAR>1694</YEAR>. <FORMAT>12.</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Seldenus</AUTHOR> <TITLE>de Diis Syris</TITLE>. <PLACE>Lips.</PLACE> <YEAR>1692</YEAR>. <FORMAT>8.</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Gottschedens</AUTHOR> <TITLE>critische Dichtkunst</TITLE>, <PLACE>Leipzig</PLACE> <YEAR>1737</YEAR>. <FORMAT>8.</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Bödickers</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Grundsätze der Deutschen Sprach</TITLE>, <PLACE>Berlin</PLACE>, <YEAR>1729</YEAR>. <FORMAT>8.</FORMAT></BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":9,"explanation":"The following corrections were made:

1. Fixed unusual characters in "Augustinergaß" (replaced "\u221a\u00fc" with "ß")
2. Fixed unusual characters in "Völcker-Historie" (replaced "\u221a\u2202" with "ö")
3. Fixed currency symbol "fl" (replaced "\u221a\u2020" with "fl")
4. Fixed a missing closing tag after the first book entry: added </BIBL> after the Sapientia book entry
5. Fixed format "8." (replaced "\u221a\u2264" with "." in three instances)
6. Fixed "Bödickers" name (replaced "\u221a\u2202" with "ö")
7. Fixed "Grundsätze" (replaced "\u221a\u00a7" with "ä")
8. Fixed nesting structure - previously a BIBL tag was incorrectly nested within another BIBL tag
9. Standardized format entries by removing the "v" character that appeared in some format specifications

These corrections maintain the semantic structure of the book advertisement while fixing encoding issues and ensuring proper XML structure."}

parsed.explanation:
The following corrections were made:

1. Fixed unusual characters in "Augustinergaß" (replaced "\u221a\u00fc" with "ß")
2. Fixed unusual characters in "Völcker-Historie" (replaced "\u221a\u2202" with "ö")
3. Fixed currency symbol "fl" (replaced "\u221a\u2020" with "fl")
4. Fixed a missing closing tag after the first book entry: added </BIBL> after the Sapientia book entry
5. Fixed format "8." (replaced "\u221a\u2264" with "." in three instances)
6. Fixed "Bödickers" name (replaced "\u221a\u2202" with "ö")
7. Fixed "Grundsätze" (replaced "\u221a\u00a7" with "ä")
8. Fixed nesting structure - previously a BIBL tag was incorrectly nested within another BIBL tag
9. Standardized format entries by removing the "v" character that appeared in some format specifications

These corrections maintain the semantic structure of the book advertisement while fixing encoding issues and ensuring proper XML structure.
